name: 胡憲倫
objective: Special topic is a two-semester course for students to learn environmental engineering and management practices. For Gambian students who choose Prof. Hu as their supervisor, their research topics will be all related to identify and provide solutions for some pressing issues regarding Gambia's environmental protection and sustainable development. Students will be guided mainly by graduate students (M.S. or Ph.D. student), however, students will be required to have a bi-weekly meeting with Prof. Hu and to demonstrate their progress on their research during the meeting.
schedule:
1.Solid waste and recycling
2.Renewable energy
3.Health
4.E-waste
5.Bottom of the Pyramid (BOP)
6.Adaptation to the climate change
7.Others

name: 倪至寬
objective:
You need to visit construction site to take pictures, observe the construction sequence, and collect all the necessary information such as grouting record, drawings and construction plans. The grouting results will be examed by the values of permeability and strength. The efficiency and side effect due to grouting is also evaluated..
1. Grouting Technology for Ground Improvement
2. Quality Control for Pipe Jacking or Microtunneling
3. Monitoring System for Underground Excavation of Highrise Building
4. 土壓平衡式推進工法標準作業程序
schedule:
Midterm report is dued at the end of first semester, 
Final report is dued at the end of second semester.
scorePolicy:
Midterm report with good quality is handed in on time, weight by 50%
Final report with good quality is handed in on time, weight by 50%
materials: Soil exploration report, construction plan and grouting program report are required to collected from job site.
